amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Wildland Fire Management funding by $57.4 million with offsets from the National Endowment for the Arts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record of July 16, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 313 (Roll no. 379).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Tancredo.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
